Reviews.Content: supposed stay cromwell crown moved olympia advanced warning explanation assistance getting hotel location olympia excellent wifi extends reception 5 huddled laptops knees privacy breakfast cost cornflakes coffee tea tables left sit eat interview morning hotel lent iron ironing board hotel heat night scorching window wide 3 hours sleep constant noise night bathroom door locked closed door bathroom fan unbearable screech tv didnt tune 1970s cups coffee plastic cartons staff utterly useless resigned customers complain owners lazy greedy god help met avoid hotel plague disgusting sense

Reviews.Title: “Not what i expected..”
Reviews.Author: StephLakeee
Reviews.Content: reading reviews internet hotel dreading stay bed bugs dirt ignorant staff totally opposite actually pleasantly surprised reached hotel stayed floor reception fine receptionist helped friendly bathroom absolutely spotless clean sheets bed nights sleep wasnt bitten breakfast basic fresh price payed complain 45 2 nights double location excellent minute walk tube station 10 minutes olympia round corner lots food eat definitely stay hotel

Reviews.Content: cheap hotel breakfast hour nd breakfast wait guests finish breakfast five kid stayed free bed ws persons sleep inwell adults extra pillow 5 daughter towel hot water morning bad pressure shower tap traffic road annoying noise isolated windows cleaning perfect hotel day sleep football sleep game couple beer takin bus train flight home day recomended familys children

Reviews.Content: stayed hotel olympia week half stayed single bed bugs lot woke morning covered seriously itching bite marks offcourse told staff bed rid bed bugs started cover bed ment bugs started bite instead itching week half life seriously dont recommend

Reviews.Title: “Never Again”

Reviews.Content: probably worst hotel stayed tiny untidy duvet unwashed windows bars looked hadnt washed booked twin 1 double bed ventilation system meaning window air listen traffic main road beside staff unhelpful unfriendly overpriced strongly recommend people avoid hotel costs thankfully stayed 1 night spoiled trip stayed

Reviews.Title: “At least Faulty Towers was clean.”

Reviews.Content: worst experience staying hotel filthy bed cover stains thrown straight wardrobe slept clothed top bed windows iron bars escape route event fire receptionist demanded cash none told cash machine despite web site saying accepted credit cards wardrobe falling apart door locks faulty windows cleaned everwe didnt dare try breakfast worst ive stayed yourself favour try else word disgusting
